abstract: The painting on the wall of my grandmother's house.
description: Jane Curtis reflects on how she spent her childhood sitting in the loungeroom of her grandparents home. As her family spoke in a language she didn't understand, Curtis was transfixed by the painting that hung on her grandparent's wall. Only as an adult would she discover the mysteries that painting held. Created as part of an ACMI Digital Storytelling Program in the Digital Studio or outreach program.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002062; Digital Storytelling workshop : general public (March 2010); Active; 2010
